newsitem.title: USA: Olicom A/S says repurchasing 700,000 shrs.
newsitem.headline: Olicom A/S says repurchasing 700,000 shrs.

text.p: The board of directors of Olicom A/S, a computer networking software and hardware maker, said Wednesday they authorized the repurchase of 700,000 shares of its common stock.

The company said in a statement that the program is dependant upon market conditions and there is no guarantee as to the exact number of shares to be bought. The purchases will be made in the open market or in privately negotiated transactions.
Olicom said it will pay for the repurchases with cash that is currently available as well as short-term investments.
Repurchased shares will be used in connection with the company's employee stock incentive program, and the remainder will be used for general corporate purposes, Olicom said.
